title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and cheese.
In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy.
Combine hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.
